head.supplied: 10/3/83 ¶ ¶ Yesterday, dear Mr Dyer, I learnt at the Gov. Offices that the expenses of your mission to Bordeaux are all settled, so that my mind is releaved on that point. Your report ¶ was here rep...

div.p: RBG Kew, Kew correspondence, Australia, Mueller 1882-90, f. 54.

Yesterday, dear Mr Dyer, I learnt at the Gov. Offices that the expenses of your mission to Bordeaux are all settled, so that my mind is releaved on that point. Your report
Thiselton-Dyer (1882). On 6 January 1883, the Melbourne Argus reported (p. 5) that the Victorian Government was reprinting Thiselton-Dyer's report for distribution to the colony's vignerons. The 'principal portions' of the report were published in the Weekly times, 13 January 1883, supplement to the Farmers gazette, p. 2, and reported, not always favourably, in other papers. was here reprinted in full in the papers.
